nodes.text: Dryden's study was the office of Dryden Vos, a crime lord and the public leader of Crimson Dawn. Vos kept several artifacts and frozen trophies in his office, which was on the top level of the First Light. He was ultimately killed in the study by his lieutenant Qi'ra, who then contacted Maul, the true leader of Crimson Dawn, from Vos' desk.
Dryden's study appears in the 2018 Star Wars Anthology film Solo: A Star Wars Story.
According to script writer Jon Kasdan, some of the artifacts were meant to foreshadow Maul's appearance.
